name: unachieved
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If your aim is unachieved, you have not succeeded in reaching it, especially after a lot of work or effort: The objectives that we set ourselves five years ago remain unachieved. I worry that so many of my goals are still unachieved as I approach the age of thirty. Related word
achieve
More examplesFewer examplesI'm confident that I can still fulfil a few of my unachieved goals.She has reached a level of success unachieved by previous managers.The goal of bringing economic prosperity to the region remains unachieved.
